definition: Hector Berlioz (1803-1869), French romantic composer, author of Symphonie Fantastique
short name for Liaoning 遼寧|辽宁[Liao2 ning2] province/Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125)
Hector Berlioz (1803-1869), French romantic composer, author of Symphonie Fantastique
pinyin: Ai1 ke4 tuo1 · Bo2 liao2 zi1

sentences.english: Berlioz compared him favorably to Beethoven and Gluck.
sentences.chinese: 柏遼茲認爲他並不亞於貝多芬和格魯克。

sentences.english: Berlioz had been its brilliant columnist.
sentences.chinese: 柏遼茲了其輝煌的專欄作家。
